duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all legal processes from investigation to trial representing clients in depositions, site inspections, court hearings, trials, and negotiating settlements as required.
Research applicable laws and develop legal strategies for all stages of litigation, sharing them with claims representatives and insured clients.
Establish and maintain good relationships with claims representatives and insured clients; occasionally conduct training sessions for Legal, Claims, or other departments.
Develop and render clear, unambiguous legal opinions and strategies; draft legal documents including pleadings and motions.
Provide guidance and direction to junior attorneys, paralegals, or law clerks; collaborate with Home Office Legal.

education_certification.credential: Membership in the Florida Bar; special licenses to practice before boards or federal courts preferred; a minimum of three years of successful litigation experience; experience representing insurance companies.
